title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 192.3 - Reports required
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 192.3 - Reports required

State Regulations

School authorities shall report to the Commissioner of

Education on or before July 15 and December 15. This report shall include the
number of pupils released, the number of days absent from school and a
statement of the provisions made to safeguard the educational interests of
pupils. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8
ยง
192.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
